DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine in DM II patients the efficacy of Crestor in obtaining the new European LDL cholesterol guidelines.
DOC.brief_title: DIALOOG: Crestor in Patients With Diabetes Mellitus Type 2: Lowering of LDL-C Levels to New European Guidelines
DOC.criteria: Diabetes Mellitus Type 2, LDLC > 2,5 mmol/l, no cholesterol lowering medication used last 3 months, starts with Crestor 10 mg, permission to use patient data by AZ
